title: Kali Love
lyrics: YG Hootie, Cali love
First off, know you hate us (Know you hate us)
I'm the only one that never baked it (No)
I'm the only one that hit the road when they said it wouldn't go
Then gave the game a face lift
I'm the one that's in them backstreets
I'm the one that had to clap heats
I'm the one that had to keep it cool when my mama 'round
Shit be [got leaked]
I'm the one stand on my own feet
Out of state with them Cali plates (Out of state)
Same one them boys chased when they tryna race
Far as G shit, I'm a archive
This real shit made me a legend like Pharcyde (Pharcyde)
Ya girl think I'm a heartthrob (What?)
In my hood it's apartheid (Apartheid)
Screaming free the big homie, to me, he a George Jackson
He been in jail since Pac died
Cali love, Cali love, Cali love
Cali love, Cali love (Westside)
California love
Cali love, Cali love, Cali love
Cali love, Cali love
My city never work for nothing (Never work for nothing, ayy)
My city love it when I'm hustlin' (Love it when I'm hustlin', ayy)
I flipped the merchandise already (I flipped the merchandise)
I've been a mogul and I'm heavy (I am a enterprise)
Every time I rep it's with the extras (With the extras)
I be O'ing, I be zoning, I be flexing (I be flexing)
This shit gotta be the owe your talk (Owe your talk)
This shit gotta be all your fault (All your fault)
Big body, move it with my name on it (With my name on it)
Big body, tell me she gon' sang on it (She gon' sang on it)
Me & my nigga Hootie, we gon' make a movie (We gon' make a movie)
I got moves to make, officer, don't shoot me (Officer, don't shoot)
California raised, California paid, yeah (Yeah)
California case, watch out for the strays, yeah (Yeah)
Ten toes down, keep it underground, yeah (Yeah)
Oh, we run it then, and we run it now, yeah
Cali love, Cali love, Cali love
Cali love, Cali love (Westside)
California love
Cali love, Cali love, Cali love
Cali love, Cali love
